stars.placeholder: Accounts that you star on the <1><0>Accounts</0></1> page will now appear here!

landing.title: Swap your assets

kyc.title: Welcome to Swap
kyc.subtitle: Exchange crypto assets directly from your Ledger device. This service is not available in the US and a few other countries.
kyc.disclaimer: By continuing, you accept that your location data will be shared with third party service providers in order for them to comply with their AML/KYC procedures.

form.bubble: We use a fixed rate, this is the exact amount you will receive.

disclaimer.description: By clicking "Confirm", I acknowledge and accept that this service is exclusively governed by Changelly's

finished.disclaimer: Please take note of your Swap ID number in case you’d need assistance from <0>{{provider}}</0> later.
finished.description: Your Swap operation has been sent to the network for confirmation. It may take up to an hour before you receive your swapped crypto assets.

account.frozenAssetsTooltip: Frozen assets are used in the Tron voting process. This represents your total number of votes.
account.delegatedAssetsTooltip: Delegated assets are used in the Cosmos voting process. This represents your total number of votes.
account.undelegatingTooltip: Undelegated assets are in a timelock of 21 days, before being available.

swap.notice: Verify the Swap details on your device before sending it. The addresses are exchanged securely so you don’t have to verify them.

installSuccess.title_plural: Apps installed successfully. You can now add your accounts

item.updateAllOutOfMemory: Not enough storage. Please uninstall some apps

item.tokenAppDisclaimer: To manage {{tokenName}} {{tokenType}} tokens, <1>install the {{appName}} app</1> and please verify you indeed have the <1>{{tokenType}} version</1> before sending <3>to your {{appName}} account</3>.
item.tokenAppDisclaimerInstalled: To manage <1>{{tokenName}} {{tokenType}} tokens</1>, please verify you indeed have the <1>{{tokenType}} version</1> before sending <3>to your {{appName}} account</3>.

uninstall.title: Uninstall all
uninstall.subtitle: Uninstall all apps?
uninstall.description: Don't worry, uninstalling apps does not affect your crypto assets. You can reinstall apps in the App catalog.

dependencyInstall.title: {{dependency}} app is required
dependencyInstall.description: The {{dependency}} app will also be installed because the {{app}} app needs it.

dependencyUninstall.title: Uninstall {{app}} and its related apps?
dependencyUninstall.description: Some of your installed apps are linked to {{app}} app. They will be uninstalled as well.

firmware.followTheGuide: Follow our step by step update guide
firmware.deprecated: Device firmware version too old to be updated. Contact Ledger Support for a replacement.
firmware.prepareSeed: Ensure your 24-word Recovery phrase is written down on the Recovery sheet and it is available, as a precaution.
firmware.disclaimerTitle: You are about to install <1>firmware version {{version}}</1>.
firmware.downloadingUpdateDesc: Please wait for the update installer to be downloaded

modal.confirmIdentifierText: Verify that the identifier on your device is the same as the identifier below. Confirm and enter your PIN code if requested.
modal.mcuSecond: Press the left button and hold it while you reconnect the USB cable until the <1><0>{{repairProcessing}}</0></1> screen appears
modal.mcuPin: Please wait for the update to finish
modal.mcuSecondNanoX: Press and hold the left button until <1><0>{{bootloaderOption}}</0></1> appears. Press both buttons to confirm and reconnect your device.
modal.mcuBlueFirst: Press and hold the side button for 10 seconds to turn off the device. Release the button.
modal.mcuBlueSecond: Press and hold the button for at least 5 seconds until the Boot Options are displayed. Tap Bootloader Mode

resetSteps.connect: Connect the {{deviceName}} to your computer using the USB cable.
resetSteps.turnOn: Press the button on the device to turn it on.
resetSteps.falsePin: Enter three wrong PINs to reset the device.
resetSteps.turnOff: Press and hold the side button until {{action}} is displayed.
resetSteps.boot: Press and hold the side button until {{option}} is displayed
resetSteps.recoveryMode: Tap {{mode}} Mode. Wait until the dashboard appears.
resetSteps.openLive: Open the Manager in Ledger Live.
resetSteps.uninstall: Click on the grey trash icon for all apps currently installed on the {{deviceName}}. This makes room for the firmware installer.
resetSteps.disclaimer: Note: Your funds are not affected by this operation, the private keys to access your crypto assets in the blockchain remain secure on your Recovery sheet.

rewards.info: Rewards can be claimed once every 24 hours.

amount.energyDescription: Energy points are required to execute smart contracts. If you don't run any smart contracts, there is no need to choose rewards in Energy.

emptyState.description: You can now earn rewards by freezing and voting.

remainingVotes.title: You still have {{amount}} votes remaining

starter.title: Earn staking rewards
starter.description: Freeze TRX to earn rewards and still keep full security and control of your assets.

bullet.access: You can unfreeze your assets after 3 days.
bullet.ledger: Freeze and vote securely with your Ledger device.

starter.termsAndPrivacy: Delegating your voting rights does not guarantee any rewards from your super representative.

freeze.title: Freeze
freeze.description: Freeze TRX to earn Bandwidth or Energy. You'll also be able to vote for Super Representatives.

unfreeze.title: Unfreeze
unfreeze.description: Unfreeze TRX to have them back in your available balance. You will no longer earn rewards.

vote.title: Vote
vote.description: Cast votes for Super Representatives to earn rewards.

vote.title: Cast votes
vote.description: Vote for one or more Super Representatives to start earning rewards.

superRepresentative.title: Super Representatives (SR)
superRepresentative.description: Super Representatives play a key role in governing the TRON community by ensuring basic functions, e.g. block generation and bookkeeping.

candidates.title: Candidates
candidates.description: 127 individuals elected through voting by the entire token holder community. Votes are updated once every 6 hours.

bitcoin.rbf: Allow the transaction to be replaced (Replace-By-Fee).

cannotSelect.unconfirmed: You cannot select coins from unconfirmed, replaceable transactions.

bitcoin.notEnoughCoins: You have not selected enough coins to meet the amount to send.

starter.description: You may earn rewards by delegating your ATOM assets to a validator.
bullet: You keep ownership of delegated assets
Assets will be available 21 days after undelegation

warning.description: Choose your validator wisely: Part of your delegated assets may be irrevocably lost if the validator does not behave appropriately.

starter.title: Redelegation
starter.description: Use redelegation to easily change from one validator to another. But if you change your mind again, you will then have to wait because redelegation triggers a 21-day timelock.
starter.warning: Choose your validator wisely: Part of your delegated assets may be irrevocably lost if the validator does not behave appropriately. You can have a maximum of <0>7 pending redelegations</0>.

validators.title: Validators
validators.warning: You will have to wait <0>21 days</0> to redelegate from the new validator, if you change your mind again
validators.selectInfo: Redelegate assets from one validator to another. When redelegating, your assets continue to generate rewards non-stop.

banner.title: Earn rewards
banner.text: You can earn Tezos staking rewards by delegating your account

hidden.disclaimer: This banner will not show up again until there is a new announcement

accounts.title: Export accounts
accounts.desc: Add your accounts in Ledger Live mobile. Your accounts will only synchronize with the blockchain, not between your mobile and desktop apps.

operations.title: Operation history
operations.desc: Save a CSV file of your account operations on your computer.

display.counterValueDesc: 잔액 및 작업 옆에 표시할 통화를 선택합니다.
display.regionDesc: Choose your region to set the time zone of Ledger Live.
display.stockDesc: Choose Western to display market increases in blue or Eastern to display them in red.
display.carouselVisibilityDesc: Enable visibility of the carousel on Portfolio

currencies.desc: Change settings for each of your crypto assets
currencies.select: Select a crypto asset to edit its settings.
currencies.confirmationsNbDesc: 트랜잭션이 확인된 것으로 표시되는 네트워크 확인 수를 설정합니다.

rates.desc:
Here are all the rates that are used to calculate countervalues.
Choose which rate providers are used for each rate.
rates.noCounterValue: We have no data for this trading pair

profile.passwordDesc: Set a password to secure the Ledger Live data on your computer, including account names, balances, transactions and public addresses.
profile.passwordAutoLockDesc: Automatically lock Ledger Live when inactive.
profile.softResetDesc: 블록 체인과 강제로 동기화하려면 Ledger Live 캐시를 지우십시오.
profile.hardResetDesc: Erase all Ledger Live data stored on your computer, including your accounts, transaction histories and settings.
profile.developerModeDesc: Manager에 개발자 및 testnet 앱을 표시합니다.
profile.analyticsDesc: Enable analytics to help Ledger improve user experience. This includes clicks, page visits, redirections, actions (send, receive, lock, etc), end of page scrolls, (un)installing and app version, number of accounts, crypto assets and operations, session durations, the Ledger device type and firmware.
profile.reportErrorsDesc: Automatically send reports to help Ledger improve its products.
profile.launchOnboardingDesc: Set up a new device or restore an existing device. Accounts and settings are kept.

about.desc: 앱 정보, 이용 약관 및 개인 정보 보호 정책.

help.desc: Ledger Live에 대해 자세히 알아보거나 도움을 받으실 수 있습니다.
help.faqDesc: If you have a problem, get help using Ledger Live with your hardware wallet.
help.termsDesc: Ledger Live를 사용함으로써 귀하는 당사 이용 약관에 동의하는 것으로 간주됩니다.
help.privacyDesc: Refer to our Privacy Policy to learn what personal data we collect, why and how we use them.

experimental.desc: Try out experimental features and let us know what you think
experimental.disclaimer: These are experimental features we provide on an "as is" basis for our tech savvy community to test. They may change, break or be removed at any time. By enabling them, you agree to use them at your own risk.

hardResetModal.title: Ledger Live 재설정
hardResetModal.desc: Reset Ledger Live to erase all settings and accounts on your computer. You can then choose your password and add your accounts back with your Ledger device. The private keys giving access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and are backed up by your Recovery phrase.

softResetModal.title: 캐시 지우기
softResetModal.desc: Clearing the cache forces network resynchronization. Your settings and accounts are preserved. The private keys to access to your crypto assets remain secure on your Ledger device and Recovery sheet.

resetFallbackModal.title: 사용자 조치 필요
resetFallbackModal.part1: 캐시 폴더를 삭제할 수 없습니다. 폴더를 수동으로 삭제하십시오.
resetFallbackModal.part5: 그런 다음 앱을 정상적으로 다시 시작할 수 있습니다.

removeAccountModal.title: 계정 제거
removeAccountModal.desc: This will not affect your crypto assets. Existing accounts can always be added again.

openUserDataDirectory.title: 사용자 데이터 보기
openUserDataDirectory.desc: View the user data stored on your computer, including your accounts, caches and settings.

repairDevice.title: 계정, 거래 내역 및 설정을 포함하여 컴퓨터에 저장된 모든 Ledger Live 데이터를 지웁니다. 암호화 자산에 액세스하기 위한 개인 키는 귀하의 Ledger 장치와 복구 시트에서 안전하게 보호됩니다.
repairDevice.descSettings: Use this to restore your Ledger device if it froze during a firmware update.

exportLogs.title: Save logs
exportLogs.desc: Saving Ledger Live logs may be needed for troubleshooting purposes.

hideEmptyTokens.title: Hide empty token accounts
hideEmptyTokens.desc: Hide token accounts with zero balance on the Accounts page.

tokenBlacklist.title: Hidden tokens
tokenBlacklist.desc: You can hide tokens by going to the parent account then right-clicking on the token and selecting 'Hide token'

setPassword.title: 암호 잠금
setPassword.subTitle: Set the password
setPassword.desc: Keep your password safe. Losing it means resetting Ledger Live and adding the accounts again.

disablePassword.title: 암호 잠금 비활성화
disablePassword.desc: Ledger Live 데이터가 암호화되지 않고 컴퓨터에 저장됩니다. 여기에는 계정 이름, 거래 및 공용 주소가 포함됩니다.

update.updateAvailable: Update to Ledger Live version {{version}} is available
update.error: 업데이트 중 오류가 발생했습니다. 다시 다운로드하십시오.
update.nightlyWarning: This version cannot auto-update. Please install the latest version manually

crash.title: Something went wrong
crash.description: Please check our support articles for possible solutions. If the problem persists, save the logs using the button below and provide them to Ledger Support.

exportOperationsModal.title: Operation history
exportOperationsModal.desc: Select the accounts for which to save the operation history
exportOperationsModal.descSuccess: The CSV file of your operation history was saved successfully in the selected folder

start.title: Ledger Live에 오신 것을 환영합니다.
start.themeDesc:
Let's start by choosing how Ledger Live looks to you.
You can change this again in your settings.

selectDevice.title: 장치 선택
selectDevice.usbOnlyTooltip: Ledger Live desktop currently does not support Bluetooth

disclaimer.note3: Never use a device with a pre-installed PIN or Recovery phrase.

nano.step2: Press the left or right button to navigate through the on-screen instructions.
nano.step4: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons together to confirm.
nano.step5: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

nanoX.step2: Press both buttons together to confirm <1><0>{{setUpAsNewDevice}}</0></1>.
nanoX.step3: 왼쪽 또는 오른쪽 버튼을 눌러 숫자를 선택합니다.
nanoX.step4: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

blue.step3: Choose a PIN with 4 to 8 digits.

nano.step2: Press the left or right button to navigate through the on-screen instructions.
nano.step4: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons together to confirm.
nano.step5: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

nanoX.step2: {{productName}} 화면의 지시에 따라 두 개의 버튼을 동시에 누릅니다.
nanoX.step4: Press the left or right button to select a digit. Press both buttons to validate.
nanoX.step5: Select ✓ to confirm your PIN code. Select ⬅ to erase a digit.

blue.step3: Choose a PIN with 4 to 8 digits.

initialize.title: Write down your Recovery phrase
initialize.desc: Your 24-word Recovery phrase is the <1>only backup</1> of all your private keys.

nano.step1: Write <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> in position 1 on a blank Recovery sheet.
nano.step2: Press the right button and continue to write down all 24 words.
nano.step3: Confirm each word of your Recovery phrase: select it then confirm it by pressing both buttons together.

blue.step1: Write down each word on a blank Recovery sheet in the exact order.
blue.step2: Tap <1><0>{{seedNext}}</0></1> and write down all words until the <3><0>{{seedConfirmation}}</0></3> screen appears.
blue.step3: Enter each word to confirm your Recovery phrase.

restore.title: Enter your Recovery phrase
restore.desc: Enter the Recovery phrase using your Recovery sheet.

nano.step1: Choose the length of your Recovery phrase.
nano.step2: Enter the first letters of <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> until the suggestions appear.
nano.step3: Choose <1><0>{{seedWord1}}</0></1> from the suggested words by pressing both buttons together.
nano.step4: Repeat the process for all words.

blue.step1: Select the length of your Recovery phrase.
blue.step2: Type the first word of your Recovery phrase. Tap the word when it appears.
blue.step3: Repeat the process for all words.

disclaimer.note1: Anyone who has your Recovery phrase also has your crypto assets.
disclaimer.note2: Never use a device with a pre-installed PIN or Recovery phrase.
disclaimer.note3: Store your Recovery phrase in a safe place, out of sight.
disclaimer.note4: Ledger does not store your private keys, nor ever asks for them.

genuineCheck.title: 보안 체크리스트
genuineCheck.descGeneric: 계속하기 전에 보안 체크리스트의 작성을 완료하십시오.

step1.title: Did you choose your own PIN?

step2.title: Did you save your own Recovery phrase?

title.pinFailed: Did you choose your own PIN?
title.recoveryPhraseFailed: Did you save your own Recovery phrase?

desc.pinFailed: Never use a device with a pre-installed PIN. Please contact Ledger Support if in doubt.
desc.recoveryPhraseFailed: Save the Recovery phrase only if it is displayed on your device, to you alone. Please contact Ledger Support if in doubt.

setPassword.title: 암호 잠금(옵션)
setPassword.desc: Set a password to secure the Ledger Live data on your computer, including account names, balances, transactions and public addresses

disclaimer.note1: Keep your password safe. Do not share it.
disclaimer.note2: Losing your password means resetting Ledger Live and adding the accounts again.
disclaimer.note3: Ledger Live 재설정은 암호화 자산에 영향을 미치지 않습니다.

analytics.title: 버그 및 분석
analytics.desc: Share anonymized data to help Ledger improve the security of its products and services

shareAnalytics.title: 분석
shareAnalytics.desc: Enable analytics to help Ledger improve user experience.

sentryLogs.title: 버그 보고서

technicalData.title: 기술 데이터*
technicalData.desc: Ledger는 사용자 경험을 향상시키기 위해 완전 익명화된 기술 데이터를 자동으로 수집합니다.
